summary: Cyberpunk 2077 — Official Cinematic Trailer E3 2019  Keanu Reeves stunned the E3 audience last night by appearing in the...
caption:
Cyberpunk 2077 — Official Cinematic Trailer E3 2019

Keanu Reeves stunned the E3 audience last night by appearing in the Cyberpunk 2077 cinematic game trailer. He then proceeded to appear live on stage to announce the eagerly anticipated sci-fi game’s release date, 16 April 2020

Cyberpunk 2077 looks excellent but I’d also love a film set in a universe like this. I love Blade Runner and simply want more of that kind of world.

title: Transgender in Cyberpunk 2077; inclusive or exploitative? - Checkpoint

summary: Cyberpunk 2077’s in-game context doesn’t matter if its marketing contributes to transphobia right now
body:
Cyberpunk 2077’s in-game context doesn’t matter if its marketing contributes to transphobia right now

This Rock Paper Shotgun post says more eloquently than I could my issues with the CP2077 transphobic advert. I agree with basically the whole article, but in particular, regarding the comments by the artist that it’s supposed to be exploitative in-game as part of the corporate dystopia feeling:

The poster could work as part of a nuanced and critical bit of world building, if it’s used in conjunction with a story willing to directly engage with the issue. Nothing shown so far even hints that this content exists in Cyberpunk 2077, and I doubt the game is going to make a significant detour to discuss and explore issues surrounding queer bodies.

But even if the game does wrap this image in all the context it needs, it doesn’t change things now.

But even if the game does wrap this image in all the context it needs, it doesn’t change things now.

summary: Victoria & Vega - The Twins “If Victoria wanted something, come hell and high water she would get it. Nothing could stand in the...
caption:
Victoria & Vega - The Twins

“If Victoria wanted something, come hell and high water she would get it. Nothing could stand in the way of that girl. And God have mercy on those who tried, since Victoria didn’t seem to have a merciful bone in her body.

Vega, always so quiet by comparison. You hardly ever noticed him. Like the smoke to Victoria’s fire he was never far behind her though. And we all know what’s more likely to kill you in the end, don’t we? Never underestimate the quiet ones.

They were fearsome together, unstoppable.”

summary: X CDPR’s explanation is entirely inadequate. ETA: CDPR is also now saying they want to give players the option to create trans...
caption:
X

CDPR’s explanation is entirely inadequate.

ETA: CDPR is also now saying they want to give players the option to create trans PCs and are suggesting they’ve written trans NPCs and…yeah…I don’t trust that they’ll handle this well. At all.

summary:
Background:
Cyberpunk 2077 è basato sull’RPG Cyberpunk 2020
Keanu Reeves interpreterà Johnny Silverhand, una rockstar...
body:
Background:

  • Cyberpunk 2077 è basato sull’RPG Cyberpunk 2020
  • Keanu Reeves interpreterà Johnny Silverhand, una rockstar popolarissima che appare in Cyberpunk 2020 e 2077
  • Silverhand compare nella side quest Never Fade Away, in cui convince il pubblico a ribellarsi durante un concerto

I WANT TO KNOW

ADRIAN CONFIRMED

blog.name: rosegardenboyfriend
blog.title: that member of Jackass you've never heard of

summary: I’ve been doing more research on Cyberpunk 2020, the lore, what the game (Cyberpunk 2077) might be like etc. and Keanu’s...
body:
I’ve been doing more research on Cyberpunk 2020, the lore, what the game (Cyberpunk 2077) might be like etc. and Keanu’s character, Johnny Silverhand, is of the character class “Samurai Rockerboy” which means he is a rockstar, and part of the samurai class. In the game trailer, we see the protagonist wearing a jacket with the ‘Samurai’ emblem on it, and they are also called this by Johnny. Basically, there are two options. One: you’ve joined the Samurais and are working under Johnny

Or, more ideally, two: Johnny has given you his club jacket and calls you Samurai as an affectionate nickname.

Thanks gays, have a nice day.

Or, more ideally, two: Johnny has given you his club jacket and calls you Samurai as an affectionate nickname.

summary: Pre-ordered! Now I just need to wait! Btw, if you’re in the US, BestBuy has a pretty good pre-order deal for Cyberpunk 2077. For...
caption:
Pre-ordered! Now I just need to wait!

Btw, if you’re in the US, BestBuy has a pretty good pre-order deal for Cyberpunk 2077. For $59.99 (+ taxes, obviously), you get a steelbook case and a $10 gift certificate.

blog.name: minerfromtarn
blog.title: Towards Peace
blog.description:
"Be he foe or friend, be he foul or clean,

brood of Morgoth or bright Vala,

Elda or Maia or Aftercomer,

Man yet unborn upon Middle-earth,

neither law, nor love, nor league of swords,

dread nor danger, not Doom itself,

shall defend him from Fëanor, and Fëanor's kin,

whoso hideth or hoardeth, or in hand taketh,

finding keepeth or afar casteth

a Silmaril. This swear we all:

death we will deal him ere Day's ending,

woe unto world's end! Our word hear thou,

Eru Allfather! To the everlasting

Darkness doom us if our deed faileth.

On the holy mountain hear in witness

and our vow remember, Manwë and Varda!"

Bi/nonbinary, any pronoun works, Decepticon, Jew

tags: im being hopeful cause im an eternal optimist
summary: So it seems CD Projekt Red has been listening to the outrage over transphobic stuff seen in demos for Cyberpunk 2077 and not...
body: So it seems CD Projekt Red has been listening to the outrage over transphobic stuff seen in demos for Cyberpunk 2077 and not only have one of the developers said that they are working to fix that, they are also currently working on adding customization options to let players make their character trans or non-binary in the game, too!

reblog.comment: So it seems CD Projekt Red has been listening to the outrage over transphobic stuff seen in demos for Cyberpunk 2077 and not only have one of the developers said that they are working to fix that, they are also currently working on adding customization options to let players make their character trans or non-binary in the game, too!

trail.content_raw: So it seems CD Projekt Red has been listening to the outrage over transphobic stuff seen in demos for Cyberpunk 2077 and not only have one of the developers said that they are working to fix that, they are also currently working on adding customization options to let players make their character trans or non-binary in the game, too!
trail.content: So it seems CD Projekt Red has been listening to the outrage over transphobic stuff seen in demos for Cyberpunk 2077 and not only have one of the developers said that they are working to fix that, they are also currently working on adding customization options to let players make their character trans or non-binary in the game, too!
